{"id":956429727,"question_id":231,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1684931282,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/956429727/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Power of Two","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPowerOfTwo(int n) {\n        \n        if(n<=0){\n            return false;\n        }\n        else if(n==1){\n            return true;\n        }\n        else{\n            if(0<n && n<1){\n                return isPowerOfTwo(pow(n,-1));\n            }\n            else{\n                if(n%2==0){\n                    return isPowerOfTwo(n/2);\n                }\n                else{\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"power-of-two","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
